txt.en: Venko and Imák are ready to join the fight!
Thettmárr has suffered grievous injury at the hands of the attacking Orcs, and will not long survive.
It is too late. Stóthkell is dead.
'We must reach Prince Ingór and Prince Durin! This way, my friends!'
Imák knows there is no time to spend on grief.

'[placeholder]... you have to protect the prince... he is in great danger!'

Thettmárr leans back and closes his eyes, seeking relief from the pain.

'Tell Líkmund... I forgive his debt... it was never about the...'
Prince Ingór requests your help in the middle of the battle.
'There is no time to mourn, [placeholder]. We must press on!'

'[placeholder]! The Orcs launched this attack upon the Gabil'akkâ while you were away, but I have not yet seen Gorgar among his warriors. He must be here somewhere!\n\n'Let your companions remain here to fortify our defences! I need you to come with me in search of the Orc leader!'
Stóthkell has been grievously wounded by the mithril hammer wielded by Gorgar the Ruthless, and will not long survive.
'I have nothing to fear from this pretender.'
'Why then does it delight in the slaying of dwarves?'
'You will pay for this, Gorgar. You will pay with your life!'
'I'd say this is message enough, boys!'
'I will be back for you, Princeling. And my hammer will sing again!'
'There is something about you, Princeling... what is it?'
'Are you the same as I am?'
Gorgar has emerged from the ranks of the Orcs to challenge the dwarves for control of Gundabad!
The dwarves have fallen, and Gundabad is lost!
The dwarves have fallen, and Gundabad is lost!
On your return to Máttugard with Imák and Venko, you discover that the dwarves at Maergrind are under attack by the forces of Gorgar!
'Come with me! We will find Gorgar and put an end to him!'
The dwarves have fallen, and Gundabad is lost!
'Where did you find that hammer, Orc?'
'It is made of mithril, and is dirtied by your touch!'
